data.name: Gehinnom Demo
data.detailed_description:
GEHINNOM DISCORD SERVER


DONT FORGET

Click on the "Follow" button and the "Add to your wishlist" green button


About the Game

Welcome to Gehinnom

Gehinnom is a multiplayer horror survival game for 1-4 players. Face the demons from the depths of Gehinnom, the objectives, loot, and map will always change.
Gehinnom Demo showcases a singleplayer only adventure with one randomly generated option out of thousands that will be available in the full version.
  • So what do you do in Gehinnom

Your mission is to collect clues for the ritual, with those clues you will have a list of items to gather to perform the ritual.
  • Gehinnom backstory

After years of treatment, you find yourself in a hospital bed, unable to keep fighting.
Once your body reaches the afterlife, you see the gates of heaven.
By a great amount of misfortune, you fall into the deeps of hell, aka Gehinnom.

  • Strategize & Win

There are a number of items you can use to your advantage, make sure to use them wisely.
  • Random scares

Every run in Gehinnom is unique, with dynamic scares based on the player's location and actions.
  • An authentic sense of horror
It's dark, it's quiet, it's frightening. The feeling of uneasiness is the way of Gehinnom.
until it's too late - and then you die.

Flashing lights warning
This game contains flashing lights that could make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive conditions.

data.short_description: Face the demons from the depths of Gehinnom, the objectives, loot, and map will always change. The Demo showcases a singleplayer only adventure with one randomly generated option out of thousands that will be available in the full version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2011 or newer)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.2
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
